General.Name: SDI Corp
General.Description: SDI Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells semiconductor lead frames, LED lead frames, stationery and office products, and high precision dies in Taiwan, China, Japan, Malaysia, and internationally. The company engages in the smelting and rolling of metal strips; manufacturing and processing of electronic components; and international trade business. SDI Corporation was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Ray  Huang
1.Title: Associate Manage of Fin. & Chief of Corp. Governance
